description: Verify that the Cookie Policy page loads correctly when accessing the /cookie-policy URL
scenario: User navigates to the Cookie Policy page to understand how cookies are used
expected_results: Display the complete Cookie Policy page with header, content sections, and proper cookie information
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/cookie-policy
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Cookie Policy'
5. Verify all cookie policy sections are visible and properly formatted

description: Verify the Essential Cookies card displays correctly with green styling and restrictions
scenario: User wants to understand essential cookies that cannot be disabled
expected_results: Display green-themed card with essential cookie information and 'Cannot be disabled' notice
procedure:
1. Navigate to /cookie-policy page
2. Locate Essential Cookies card in types grid
3. Verify green background styling (bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-900/20)
4. Check green border (border-green-200 dark:border-green-800)
5. Verify green icon background (bg-green-600)
6. Check 'Essential Cookies' heading in green text
7. Verify description 'Required for basic website functionality'
8. Check list includes authentication, security, theme, language preferences
9. Verify 'Cannot be disabled' notice at bottom
10. Test card styling in dark mode

description: Verify cookie policy page loads efficiently with grid layouts and styling
scenario: User accesses cookie policy and expects reasonable loading times
expected_results: Page loads within acceptable time limits with all content, cards, and styling
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to /cookie-policy page
4. Record page load time
5. Verify total load time is under 3 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) metrics
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for any render-blocking resources
10. Verify content loads progressively
11. Test performance of grid layouts and card rendering

description: Verify all required cookie policy sections are present and properly numbered
scenario: Legal review to ensure cookie policy meets standard requirements
expected_results: All 9 main sections are present with proper numbering and comprehensive content
procedure:
1. Navigate to /cookie-policy page
2. Verify '1. What Are Cookies?' section
3. Check '2. How We Use Cookies' section
4. Verify '3. Types of Cookies We Use' with four cookie types
5. Check '4. Specific Cookies We Use' with table structure
6. Verify '5. Third-Party Cookies' with hCaptcha information
7. Check '6. Managing Cookies' with browser instructions
8. Verify '7. Data Protection and Privacy' through '9. Contact Us'
9. Check all subsection numbering is correct (6.1 Browser Settings)
10. Verify content completeness and legal adequacy

description: Verify the 'What Are Cookies' section explains cookie definition and purpose
scenario: User wants to understand basic cookie concepts and functionality
expected_results: Display clear explanation of cookies as small text files stored on devices
procedure:
1. Navigate to /cookie-policy page
2. Scroll to 'What Are Cookies?' section
3. Verify section heading '1. What Are Cookies?' is displayed
4. Check content explains cookies as 'small text files'
5. Verify mention of storage on 'device (computer, tablet, or mobile)'
6. Check explanation of helping provide better experience
7. Verify text mentions remembering preferences and usage understanding
